Name: William
Text: It's going to be tough. He's caught us off guard. We barely have any units...

Name: Sally
Text: With my connections in the finance reagion, we've got the budget to be able to use bases!

Name: Sally
Text: We can use them to deploy units.

Name: William
Text: I'm glad we have you Sally. I had thought the University closed all their bases for good.

Name: William
Text: But how do we use them?

Name: Sally
Text: Don't worry- We'll go through the steps!.

Name: Sally
Text: First, place the cursor on an empty base. They are the ones with the slanted roofs. Then select it.

Name: Sally
Text: A list of units will be displayed. Units that you can't afford will appear in gray.

Name: Sally
Text: Select a unit you want to deploy. If you don't want to deploy one, you can always cancel.

Name: Sally
Text: Remember, you can't move units you've just deployed on the same turn.

Name: William
Text: To fund our army we'll have to capture more properties here.

Name: Sally
Text: Let's show this guy that Money is Power!
